===Etymology===
During the {{w|Han Dynasty}}, the three highest civil posts, {{zh-l|三公}}, were {{zh-l|太師}}, {{zh-l|太傅}} and {{zh-l|太保}}. These were the three highest civil positions at the time (modern equivalent ~ {{w|White House Chief of Staff}} or [[prime minister]]), and were roughly equivalent in rank to the subsequent position of {{zh-l|宰相|{{w|Chancellor of China}}}}.
